description:
version 2.0: Fixed only vowels left issue. version 1.6: Sound (turned off by default) and option to limit Bankruptcies. version 1.5: pick a letter button removed (redundant) version 1.4: Completely removed sound. version 1.3 update:Added sound. version1.2 update:Added sound. version 1.1 update: Based on reviews added keyboard entry and removed letter order restriction while solving the title.
The objective of the game is to solve cinema titles and earn as much prize money as possible.Each time you spin, you have to pick a letter. You can buy a vowel when you have money in that round. You will earn $1000 more for solving the title (before all the letters are revealed).
